widget.name: Forex pip calculator
widget.description:
Forex pip calculator. To calculate how much pips you made on a currency pair. Do you know how much pips the market moved? Problems with calculating it? Use this app to calculate that. It also automatically calculates how much money each pip is worth and the total amount of money you made on a trade. Easy and quick calculation. Let the app do the work.
It also automatically calculates the required margin you need for the position. Calculate all kind of pairs. EURUSD, GBPUSD, AUDUSD, AUDNZD, EURGBP etc.
widget.author: Blog.FxRaid.com
